bibl.title: Berenike: Archaeological Fieldwork at a Ptolemaic-Roman Port on the Red Sea Coast of Egypt 2008-2010. Avec résumés en italien, en anglais et en français.
bibl.note: Fieldwork of the Universities of Delaware and Warsaw (Polish Center of Mediterranean Archaeology), 2008-2010. - Introduction. - Topographic survey. - Geophysical surveys. - Excavations. - Ptolemaic industrial area. - Urban water supply [in the light of an archive of ca. 240 ostraca recording details about fresh water supply in the first century AD]. - Inhabitants of Berenike: commercial activities and ethnicities. - Religious activities. - Ships and the long distance trade. - Desert hinterland survey. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E. and Iwona ZYCH, Berenike: Archaeological Fieldwork at a Ptolemaic-Roman Port on the Red Sea Coast of Egypt 2008-2010. Avec résumés en italien, en anglais et en français.

Fieldwork of the Universities of Delaware and Warsaw (Polish Center of Mediterranean Archaeology), 2008-2010. - Introduction. - Topographic survey. - Geophysical surveys. - Excavations. - Ptolemaic industrial area. - Urban water supply [in the light of an archive of ca. 240 ostraca recording details about fresh water supply in the first century AD]. - Inhabitants of Berenike: commercial activities and ethnicities. - Religious activities. - Ships and the long distance trade. - Desert hinterland survey. - Conclusion.
